subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: New Orleans point guard Chris Paul was in Brooklyn on Tuesday with a couple of his N.B.A. buddies, but the topic of conversation was the prospect of him one day playing for the Knicks.
snippet: New Orleans point guard Chris Paul was in Brooklyn on Tuesday with a couple of his N.B.A. buddies, but the topic of conversation was the prospect of him one day playing for the Knicks.
